original: Jacobson, Gunnar, överingenjör, Göteborg, f. 8/8/83 i Gunnarsnäs, Älvsb. 1., av maskinmäst. Carl J. o. Christina Jolmsson. G. 16 m. Astrid Larsson. Barn: Brita f. 17, skolkökslär., Gbg, Anders 19, civ:ing., Södertälje. — Utex. fr. CTI 09. Övering., chefsassist. o. styr :led. i Bohus Mek. Verkst. A-B sed. 3’5. En av init :tag. t. Gbgs friv. motorbåtsilott., led. av Gbgs motorbåtssällsk. o. Dalslands gille. Medl. av Frimurarorden o. Odd Fellow. Hobbies: segling o. motorbåt sport.
translated: Jacobson, Gunnar, Chief Engineer, Gothenburg, b. 8/8/1883 in Gunnarsnäs, Älvsborg County, son of Chief Engineer Carl J. and Christina Jolmsson. Married on the 16th with Astrid Larsson. Children: Brita, b. 1917, school kitchen teacher in Gothenburg; Anders, b. 1919, civil engineer in Södertälje. Graduated from CTI in 1909. Chief Engineer, Assistant Manager, and Board Member at Bohus Mechanical Works AB since 1935. Co-founder of the Gothenburg Volunteer Motorboat Pilot Association, member of the Gothenburg Motorboat Club and Dalsland Association. Member of the Freemasons and Odd Fellows. Hobbies: sailing and motorboat sports.
